items.question: Is the app free to use?
items.answer: Yes, registration and access to a large portion of content is completely free. For advanced content, you can purchase a subscription.

items.question: How can I register?
items.answer: Just click the 'Start Free' button and register with your phone number.

items.question: Does the app work on mobile?
items.answer: Yes, our app works on both web and mobile (Android and iOS).

items.question: Can I study questions offline?
items.answer: In the subscription version, you can download videos and study offline.
